segments.advisor_message: So, um, let's talk about your health, right? How are you feeling these days? Any, like, big issues or just the usual stuff?
segments.client_message: Oh, you know, I mean, I'm okay, but I kinda feel, like, tired a lot and, uh, I've got a few aches here and there. Nothing major, though, I guess.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, tiredness can really, like, take a toll on you. Are you, um, a smoker or anything?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I smoke, like, a pack a day, I guess? Been doing it since I was, um, 18 or so. It's hard to quit, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Yeah, that's tough. And what about, like, long-term care? Do you think you might need that in the future?
segments.client_message: Um, I dunno, maybe. I mean, my family has had some health issues, so I guess there's a chance I might need some kind of care. Also, I don't have a will or, like, any power of attorney stuff set up yet.
